name: homogenize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
food & drink
  specialized to treat milk so that the cream is mixed into other parts of the liquid: The dairy industry homogenizes milk to prevent the cream from rising.
usually disapproving to change something so that all its parts or features become the same or very similar: TV has homogenized the culture and language of large parts of the planet.
